actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

actions.subcommittee: SBA, the General Economy, and Minority Enterprise Development
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on SBA, the General Economy, and Minority Enterprise Development.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on SBA, the General Economy and Minority Enterprise Development

official_title: To amend the Small Business Act to provide women-owned small business concerns eligibility for participation in certain programs which provide opportunities to perform Federal procurement contracts, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Small Business Act to make women-owned small business concerns eligible to participate in its subcontracting programs. Declares that the community property laws of a jurisdiction shall not be applied in determining eligibility of a women-owned business to participate in such programs.

titles.title: To amend the Small Business Act to provide women-owned small business concerns eligibility for participation in certain programs which provide opportunities to perform Federal procurement contracts, and for other purposes.
